name: Sudhanshu Kakkar

roles.title: Research Assistant – AI and ML
highlights: Extending my existing multi class depression detection project with a custom non pretrained ML model.
Researching model architectures to classify depression levels from text.
Evaluating performance to improve prediction reliability.

roles.title: AI Engineer and Developer
highlights: Enhanced existing web application to improve UI, usability, performance, and user experience

Collaborated on building a feature that leveraged agentic AI (Crew AI) to automate web scraping, convert unstructured data into structured formats, and enrich it through LLM calls for generating actionable insights.

roles.title: Senior Software Development Engineer (Full Stack Developer)
highlights: Developed a standalone payment gateway app in React JS processing 400+ transactions daily.
Built 15G/H submission and download app using React JS and Java Spring Boot microservices.
Automated build generation and obfuscation using Node.js, saving 2 hours daily.
Led architectural improvements for optimization and AppSec score of 94%.
Created boilerplate code generation scripts saving 15 min/module.
Led and mentored a 5-member team ensuring code quality via reviews and pair programming.

roles.title: Software Development Engineer II (Full Stack Developer)
highlights: Developed backend microservices using Java Spring Boot and PostgreSQL.
Improved frontend speed by 50% using Micro-Frontends and Redux Toolkit.
Delivered and maintained 6+ net banking modules (Accounts, Payee, Fund Transfers, etc.).

roles.title: Software Development Engineer II (Front End Developer)
highlights: Built Internet Banking UI with React, Redux, and Material UI reducing load time by 50%.
Created 50+ reusable components for faster, consistent UI assembly.
Collaborated with UX/UI, backend teams in agile cycles for product delivery.

roles.title: System Engineer (Front End Developer)
highlights: Developed logistics mobile app using React Native, Redux, and Material UI.
Resolved 200+ QA defects improving app stability and performance.
Deployed and maintained the app across platforms.
Led weekly demos to stakeholders and integrated feedback efficiently.
